title: Drawing, Birth of Bacchus; triumph of Bacchus and Arianna; Triumph of Silos
title_raw: Birth of Bacchus; triumph of Bacchus and Arianna; Triumph of Silos
medium: Pen and dark brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed on recto: nasita di Bacco Bacco sposa Arianna; Trionfo di Bacco e Arianna Trionfo delle quattro Stagioni; Sacrifici a Bacco Pan asiste a sacrifici di Bacco; la vendemia Trionfo di Sileno
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Birth of Bacchus; triumph of Bacchus and Arianna; Triumph of Silos. Pen and dark brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1927
